name: interbed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to form layers between different types of rock or other substances: be interbedded with The sand and mud layers are interbedded with sheets of charcoal.interbed with The volcanic strata interbed with mid Triassic sedimentary rocks.
More examplesFewer examplesSilty mudstones interbedded with very fine-grained sandstones represent marine offshore deposits.The Lancara Formation is formed of dolomite, limestone, and interbedded shale.Similar patterns of rock formation are occasionally seen where interbedded hard and soft rocks outcrop.
